name: iccssred
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0[[,]]c1)⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: A closed real interval is a set of reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
